description.S1: Now that you have Celeste's lapel,
description.S2: she can finally place the finishing touches on her prototype.

blurb.B2: the player will find her dead,
blurb.B3: in the middle of her store.
blurb.B4: A Corporate Commander will instruct the player to stand back.
blurb.B5: Pressing further reveals that whatever the Chimaera was supposed to look like,
blurb.B6: was not in fact legal in Byzantium.
blurb.B7: As such, being caught red handed with the garment in her possession,
blurb.B8: an attempt at her arrest was made by the Corporate Troopers,
blurb.B9: but unfortunately for her, she didn't feel like cooperating,
blurb.B10: and the guards didn't feel like negotiating,
blurb.B12: The player has the option to accuse the Trooper of murder and attack,
blurb.B13: but this understandably a bad idea being that this individual is a high ranking member of Byzantium's Police Force.
blurb.B14: The other option is to simply call them insane,
blurb.B15: in which case they say UDL's motto, and walk off.

description.S2: but she may have left her prototype suit behind.

dialog.speaker: ByzTaskForceCommander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hey. Careful. Don't go running around in the middle of a crime scene.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I didn't think this kind of thing happened here.

dialog.speaker: ByzTaskForceCommander (Female)
dialog.utterance: You mean Ms. Jolicoeur. She was reported for practicing a subversive aesthetic.

dialog.speaker: ByzTaskForceCommander (Female)
dialog.utterance: We found her in her office working on something perverse. She didn't cooperate, so we had to put her down.

dialog.speaker: ByzTaskForceCommander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Never took her for a dissident sympathizer.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Did you really have to kill her? We were doing business.

dialog.speaker: ByzTaskForceCommander (Female)
dialog.utterance: No argument there. Feels like the whole colony's going insane, what with dissidents infiltrating the walls of Byzantium.

dialog.speaker: ByzTaskForceCommander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Byzantium cultural standards are enforced by Universal Defense Logistics. Universal Defense Logistics - your first and last line of defense in the war against sedition.

dialog.speaker: ByzTaskForceCommander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Byzantium security regrets any disruption to regular flow of commerce. However, cultural and moral hygiene must always be maintained.

dialog.speaker: ByzTaskForceCommander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Strange times we live in. Radicals and dissidents living within the walls of Byzantium, hiding in plain sight. Never imagined Ms. Jolicoeur was one of them.

dialog.speaker: ByzTaskForceCommander (Female)
dialog.utterance: You say that, but subversives work in subtle ways. Ms. Jolicoeur's art was found in violation of the Board's cultural standards.
